services.name: Bun bo Hue
services.content: Bún bò Huế or bún bò is a popular Vietnamese soup containing rice vermicelli (bún) and beef (bò). Huế is a city in central Vietnam associated with the cooking style of the former royal court. The dish is greatly admired for its balance of spicy, sour, salty, and umami flavors. The predominant flavor is that of lemongrass. Compared to phở or bún riêu, the noodles are thicker and more cylindrical

services.name: Banh Khot
services.content: It’s a famous Vietnamese dish of miniature pancakes served with herbs and vegetables and spicy sweet fish sauce for dipping. The batter is made of a combination of mostly rice flour, and even leftover grains of rice, with a hint of turmeric to give them a beautiful yellow tinge, and mixed together with coconut milk to make it extra creamy and rich.

services.name: Beefsteak
services.content: A beefsteak is a type of banquet in which sliced beef tenderloin is served to diners as all-you-can-eat finger food. The dining style originated in 19th-century New York City as a type of working-class celebration but went into a decline in the mid-20th century

services.name: Chicken Fried
services.content: Country chicken is fried with the best fish sauce

services.name: Yakisoba
services.content: Yakisoba (Japanese: 焼きそば [jakiꜜsoba]), literally 'fried buckwheat', is a Japanese noodle stir-fry dish. Although soba means buckwheat, yakisoba noodles are actually made from wheat flour, and are typically flavored with a condiment similar to oyster sauce. The dish first appeared in food stalls in Japan during the early 20th century.

services.name: Steamed Squid
services.content: Steam is the easiest way to prepare seafood and from this cooking method we can enjoy and taste the freshness of the seafood we are having. Recommend to switch with other seafood for this recipe.

services.name: Pho
services.content: Pho is a traditional Vietnamese dish, also considered one of the typical dishes for Vietnamese cuisine. The main ingredient of pho is rice noodles and broth (or southern style soups) along with sliced beef or chicken. Also included are spices such as: pepper, lemon, fish sauce, chili ... These spices are added depending on the taste of each user.

services.name: Life jacket
services.content: The Harmony Universal Life Jacket PFD is a one-size-fits-all personal flotation device that is the ultimate combination of convenience, value, and comfort. It's designed to fit a wide range of people and be used in a variety of watersport activities. Whether it's a day on the lake with the family, an outing in your canoe, or floating down a gentle stream in an inner tube, the Universal PFD will not let you down.
